thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A true gem
thread.title_full: A true gem - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Skoglando
title: A true gem
text:
I echo what everyone else says about the location of this hotel. It is so central to the city and almost everywhere is walkable. For the few times we did take a bus, we just walked two blocks.
I felt very safe in the area surrounding the hotel.
The front desk was very detailed in arranging a car to the airport, preparing a take-away breakfast and remembering we had a guest remaining in our room for a few hours after checking out.
There is a delicious deli in the same piazza and one of the best gelato shops is just two blocks away. Great shopping can be found in all the side streets off the piazza.
A lot of value for a great price.
